description: PA238Q comes with rich connectivity including DisplayPort, HDMI, DVI, D-sub. It is also equipped with four USB 2.0 ports so that users could easily connect PA238Q to many peripherals, such as USB drives, keyboard, mouse, digital camera, etc. Embedded LED backlight panel helps power saving and environmental protection with no mercury usage.
